function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Dependence on air conditioning systems for thermal comfort","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission","Mitigation":"Improving filtration and ventilation processes within HVAC systems","Technologies":"Advanced filtration systems, increased air exchange rates, UV germicidal irradiation","People":"Building occupants, especially in crowded areas","Owner":"Building owners, HVAC technicians"},{"Description":"Inadequate review of construction, design, and maintenance of HVAC systems","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission due to ineffective HVAC systems","Mitigation":"Thorough review and evaluation of HVAC systems and their suitability for the pandemic situation","Technologies":"Advanced HVAC monitoring systems, ventilation control systems, air quality sensors","People":"Building design and maintenance professionals","Owner":"Public health authorities, building owners"},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and air supply in buildings","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne transmission of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation system design, maintenance, and air supply in buildings","Technologies":"Energy recovery ventilators, demand-controlled ventilation, air purifiers","People":"Building occupants, especially in poorly ventilated spaces","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners"}]}
